game.name: I am The Ninja II
game.description: I am the ninja is an intense platformer, Unleash your ninja powers with new and intuitive touch controls! Run, jump, slide, and fly to avoid all spikes or you will explode in fresh blood. Follow the master and complete all levels to unlock the endless mode and beat all scores
